name: Primal Party
description:
Join the party and team up with your favorite pri-mate. Compete in a number of minigames to be crowned the champion of the Primal Party!

Primal Party is a local multiplayer party game that focuses on 2vs2 competition. Currently it features three game modes Coin Rush (can also be played 1vs1), Barrel Runners and Bamboozle Party as the final big game mode. A fourth mode has been in early development, but is currently put on hold.

Key Features

Steal barrels with your tail, defend your loot against the other team and raiding knights or get on a greedy hunt for shiny trophies. But watch out for the falling fruits! Make use of the fruit`s explosive powers before your opponents do, to bamboozle them and achieve victory. 

Even though Primal Party is easy to pick up, if you want to succeed you will need the proper bamboozling approach and the right teammate to be crowned Champion of the Primal Party!

- Primal Party has been developed for use with  controllers -

Future of Primal Party

Currently Primal Party's development of further modes is put on hold as the team is heading towards its next project. If the community's demand for further game modes is high enough however, the team might just follow up on that ;)
